PHRASE.LANG: Servicio de emergencias - Cuerpo de policía - Pack

Speed to the rescue with these police officer uniforms and police car locomotion.
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Emergency Services - Police Force - Patrol Car
 ・This locomotion object will boost your speed.
 ・・Standard Speed = 5.25 m/s
 (2) Emergency Services - Police Force - Hat (Men)
 (3) Emergency Services - Police Force - Uniform (Men)
 (4) Emergency Services - Police Force - Trousers (Men)
 (5) Emergency Services - Police Force - Baton (Men)
 (6) Emergency Services - Police Force - Shoes (Men)
 (7) Emergency Services - Police Force - Hat (Women)
 (8) Emergency Services - Police Force - Uniform (Women)
 (9) Emergency Services - Police Force - Trousers (Women)
 (10) Emergency Services - Police Force - Baton (Women)
 (11) Emergency Services - Police Force - Shoes (Women)
 
 ※The patrol car is a portable item.
 ※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]

 Ce lot contient :

 ・Cet objet de locomotion augmentera votre vitesse.
 ・・Vitesse standard = 5,25 m/s

 (3) Services d'urgence - Police - Uniforme (homme)

 (7) Services d'urgence - Police - Casquette (femme)
 (8) Services d'urgence - Police - Uniforme (femme)
 (9) Services d'urgence - Police - Pantalon (femme)
 (10) Services d'urgence - Police - Matraque (femme)
 (11) Services d'urgence - Police - Chaussures (femme)

Helfen Sie, Leben zu retten - mit diesen Polizeiuniformen und diesem Streifenwagen als Locomotion-Objekt.
 
 Dieses Paket enthält:
 (1) Notdienste - Polizei - Streifenwagen
 Mit diesem Locomotion-Objekt erhöhen Sie Ihre Geschwindigkeit:
 ・Normale Geschwindigkeit = 5,25 m/s
 
 (2) Notdienste - Polizei - Kappe (Herren)
 (3) Notdienste - Polizei - Uniform (Herren)

 (8) Notdienste - Polizei - Uniform (Damen)
 (9) Notdienste - Polizei - Hose (Damen)
 (10) Notdienste - Polizei - Schlagstock (Damen)
 (11) Notdienste - Polizei - Schuhe (Damen)
 
 ※Der Streifenwagen ist ein tragbarer Gegenstand.
 ※Nach dem Kauf werden die Produkte in ihren jeweiligen Kategorien abgelegt. [#Legal]

 ・Questo oggetto di trasporto farà aumentare la tua velocità.
